attributes.action: To take greater action againt the junta in Burma - Save-Burma-Now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British Public would like to see the British Government and other nations to use military force. Monks and innocent civilians are being attacked and killed, people of peaceful protests are being hurt and it is time to take action - not sit back. We want immediate action

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
